mapper.select: select a.genotype_id,b.map_gene_id,a.conseqtype,a.effect from genotype_annotate_gene a inner join gene b on a.g_id=b.g_id where a.genotype_id=#{genotypeId}
select a.report_gene_id,a.entrez_gene_symbol from report_gene a, gwas_association_report_gene b where a.rpg_id=b.rpg_id and b.ga_id=#{gaId}
